tit.e: Oni no Manaita and Oni no Setchin (Granite Remains in Asuka Village, Takaichi County, Nara Prefecture)

sen.j: 鬼の俎（おにのまないた）と鬼の雪隠（おにのせっちん）は、奈良県高市郡明日香村野口（鬼の俎）、明日香村平田（鬼の雪隠）にある花崗岩で作られた遺構。
sen.e: The Oni-no Mamanaita (Devil's Chopping Board) and Oni-no Secchin (Devil's Toilet) are remnants made of granite located in Noguchi, Asuka-mura, Takaichi-gun, Nara Prefecture (Oni-no Mamanaita), and in Hirata, Asuka-mura (Oni-no Secchin).

The Oni no Manaita (Devil's Chopping Board) and Oni no Setchin (Devil's Toilet) are remains made of granite located in Noguchi (Oni no Manaita), and in Hirata (Oni-no Setchin) of Asuka Village, Takaichi County, Nara Prefecture.
